draft_account_id.description: Unique ID for the Draft Account - System generated (BE)

business_unit_id.description: ID of the Business Unit the Draft Account belongs to

created_at.description: Date the Draft Account was created (first submitted) - System generated (BE)

submitted_by.description: ID of the User that last submitted the Draft Account for checking

validated_at.description: [Optional] Date the Draft Account was validated - System generated (BE)

validated_by.description: [Optional] ID of the User that validated the Draft Account

account_snapshot.description: Summary business data to identify the Account - System generated (BE) from Account data (JSON)

account_type.description: Type of Account, such as Fixed Penalty Registration

account_status.description: Status of the Draft Account - one of Submitted, Resubmitted, Rejected, Approved, Deleted

timeline_data.description: Status changes to the Draft Account in chronological order (JSON Array) - System generated (UI)

account_number.description: [Optional] The Opal Account Number (2char letter code+account number) created on validation - System generated (BE)

account_id.description: [Optional] Opal Account ID created on validation - System generated (BE)
